name: arcade
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a covered area or passage in which there are shops: a shopping arcade
Nick Rains/Corbis Documentary/GettyImages
a covered passage joined to a building on one side and with columns and arches along the other side

Add to word list
an area where there are many electronic or other coin-operated games for the public: video-game arcades a carnival arcade
An arcade is also a covered area between buildings, esp. one with arches and columns where there are shops.
Add to word list
Add to word list
a covered area or passage containing stores: shopping arcade
